name: OROMO LEGACY LEADERSHIP & ADVOCACY ASSOCIATION (OLLAA)
description: OLLAA is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit, human rights organization.
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to human rights, womens rights, and indigenous rights in Oromo communities around the world.
